parsed.recap:
DEV: Lisle village obliterated when Rance's latent Mage-Gift violently awakened during bandit attack; villagers carried off; Rance collapsed in crater; Senta found and Chose him; evidence discovered—bandits wore hidden red robes (Karsite), fled toward Menmellith; theorized captives for blood magic ritual; Rance collapsed from Gift-shock; Senta transported him unconscious four days to Haven; arrived Healers' Collegium.

PEND: Rance's memories still blocked; untrained dangerous Gift; Queen's Circle briefing imminent; Karsite blood magic revival implications; fate of captured villagers.
